Text:
Amahist,

In the torrent world, you are a hero.

Many, many thanks for upping these films. 

Your work is not only appreciated by science fiction buffs, but deeply admired!

I was in the right place at the right time with the right files.  :o)  I have no idea how definitive this collection is, but it's a damn good one and I'm thrilled that I could help bring it back to life.
